articles.description: A protester who attended Melbourne's Black Lives Matter rally has tested positive for coronavirus and it may be impossible to identify all of their close cont...
articles.content:
A protester who attended Melbourne's Black Lives Matter rally has tested positive for coronavirus and it may be impossible to identify all of their close contacts at the event.
